content.html: Fuck all this shit. We want, whilst working full time, to have no need for benefits, food banks etc. My pop worked in a factory, full time, mum looked after 4 of us, no benefits, no food banks. Sort the basics out. This means sod all. If you can't do it, then go & let others try
